description:
'''Caswell Senior''' (born October 27, 1986), known professionally as '''Casanova''', is an American rapper from [[Brooklyn]], New York City. In October 2016, following the local success of his debut single "Don't Run", he signed with [[Memphis Bleek]]'s [[Memphis Bleek #Warehouse Music Group|Warehouse Music Group]] and [[Jay-Z]]'s [[Roc Nation]].

In 2020, he was indicted on [[Racketeer Influenced and Corrupt Organizations Act|RICO]] charges alongside 17 others, due to various criminal activities that his [[Bloods]] gang "Untouchable Gorilla Stone Nation" allegedly participated in, and sentenced to 15 years.
